identified-content.person: GODVIN, REGINA MARIE (REGINA MARIE DE GERSDORFF)

block.p: Regina Marie Godvin, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. David L. Godvin of Rumson, N.J., was married there yesterday to Stephen Ogden de Gersdorff, a son of Carl de Gersdorff of New York and Susan Gilbertson of Rumson. The Rev. Francis G. Hilton performed the ceremony at the Holy Cross Roman Catholic Church.
Mrs. de Gersdorff is the marketing communications specialist at Philip Morris International Inc., in Rye Brook, N.Y. She graduated from Boston College. Her father is an investment banker in Rumson.

Regina Marie Godvin, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. David L. Godvin of Rumson, N.J., was married there yesterday to Stephen Ogden de Gersdorff, a son of Carl de Gersdorff of New York and Susan Gilbertson of Rumson. The Rev. Francis G. Hilton performed the ceremony at the Holy Cross Roman Catholic Church.
Mrs. de Gersdorff is the marketing communications specialist at Philip Morris International Inc., in Rye Brook, N.Y. She graduated from Boston College. Her father is an investment banker in Rumson.

Mr. de Gersdorff is an account executive for the New England Life Insurance Company in Neptune, N.J. He graduated from the Fashion Institute of Technology. His father is a vice president at Kidder, Peabody & Company, the brokerage firm, in New York.
